toolbarVisibility.notes: Toolbar appears on all event clicks with proper z-index

positioning.notes: Positioning system calculates click position and handles viewport boundaries

releaseNotes.summary: FloatingToolbar for Event Management successfully implemented with guaranteed visibility and reliable positioning
